creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: walking man with long beard and long nose, carrying a pack on his back and holding a tall T-shaped walking stick with an owl perched on top; cluster of cottages in background

title: Untitled [walking man with owl]
